title: Tomato, lentil and orange soup
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 tablespoon butter', '1 small onion, diced', '1 garlic clove, crushed', '1 large orange, zest reserved, peeled and segmented', '75g red lentils', '1 (400g) tin of chopped tomatoes', '450ml vegetable or chicken stock', 'Salt and pepper, to taste', 'Freshly chopped mint (optional)']
